basics.name: Kangsheng("Hurley") Qi
basics.summary: Motivated and highly skilled candidate with Bachelor's degrees in Computer Science and Mathematics, and strong foundation and research experience in computer science and computational biology. Experienced in machine learning, bioinformatics, and data analysis. Eager to pursue a Ph.D. to further investigate the intersections of biology, computer science, and mathematics

work.name: The Oden Institute for Computational Engineering and Sciences, UT Austin
summary: Conduct interviews with distinguished faculty members on advanced multidisciplinary research projects
Write articles that highlight significant student and faculty achievements, as well as notable events and profiles
Provide administrative support to graduate students, including assisting with on-boarding, organizing social events, and coordinating community outreach
Design and produce the institution's annual report, ensuring accurate and professional presentation of research outcomes and institutional achievements

work.name: Dr. Can Cenik Lab, UT Austin
summary: Investigate translation efficiency (TE) of Caenorhabditis elegans genes through ribosome profiling and RNA sequencing data using in-lab softwares
Predict novel gene function for Caenorhabditis elegans genes based on TE calculations and collaborate with experimental team for validation
Develop advanced machine learning algorithms to enhance TE-based functional predictions

work.name: PHYZ Lab, UT Austin
summary: Applied chaos theory concepts, time series analysis, and deep learning methods to neonatal intensive care unit (NICU) patient heart rate data for bradycardia prediction
Designed a real-time monitoring system for clinical use, aimed at improving medical treatments applications and supporting healthcare professionals
Collaborated with clinicians and researchers on multiple projects, including electroceuticals, gait analysis, and delirium forecasting, to provide computational insights and feedback

work.name: Dr. Stephen Yi Lab, UT Austin
summary: Improved the efficiency of a Gibbs sampling motif-finding algorithm through parallelization techniques
Contributed to the curation of a comprehensive antibody/antigen mutation dataset

work.name: Department of Mathematics, UT Austin
summary: Collaborated with instructors on grading criteria, provided constructive feedback to students
Managed unforeseen challenges, including student medical emergencies and miscommunications, to ensure the smooth flow of the course

publications.name: Understanding the Parallelizability of Gibbs Sampling for DNA Motif Finding
Translation efficiency covariation across cell types is a conserved organizing principle of mammalian transcriptomes

education.institution: The University of Texas at Austin

projects.name: HyenaEnhancer (Manuscript in Preparation)
highlights: Adapted a Large Language Models (LLM) to predict the functional activity of enhancer sequences, focusing on genomic regulatory elements
Conducted a comparative analysis of LLM against Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) for enhancer prediction, exploring the advantages and limitations of each

projects.name: High Performance Matrix Matrix Multiplication
highlights: Utilized blocking, five loops, and assembly microkernel to implement a matrix matrix multiplication algorithm optimized for near-peak performance on Haswell microarchitecture
Ensured algorithmic correctness and high performance across matrices of varying sizes, shapes, and storage patterns

projects.name: Operating System Kernel with Donkey Kong Game
highlights: Implemented an operating system kernel with virtual memory, file systems, multi-processing support on a x86-32 bit architecture
Collaborated with a team to integrate keyboard input handling, hardware interrupts, and graphics rendering to enable the Donkey Kong game to run on the custom OS kernel

projects.name: Student Record System (Project)
highlights: Designed and implemented a three-tier architecture framework with a MySQL database for efficient management of student data, such as class schedule, personal information and others
Ensured data persistence through MyBatis and integrated web functionalities using Jakarta Servlet for dynamic user interaction
